title: LET'S GO! Elon Musk's Twitter Takeover INCOMING
description:
Pop popcorn, because Elon Musk and Twitter could announce a deal TODAY! We'll discuss the latest and why it's not a moment too soon, especially after the EU announced new digital "hate crime" laws. Also, there were a LOT of hilarious protester fails this weekend. Let's all laugh at them together.

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/ 

GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/elon-bought-twitter-cue-meltdown
